text: Na'ankure ana maka Siria vahe'mo'zama koro'ma fre'nazana, ana kinaga Siria vahera Ra Anumzamo'a zamagesa eri hagro hige'zama antahi'zana, tusi'a sondia vahe krefamo hosi afu agumpine, karisifine mani'ne'za ha' eme huzmanteku eri'za neaza agasasagna agasasa nentahi'za, amanage hu'za hu'naze, Keho Israeli kini ne'mo'a, Hiti kinine, Isipi kinine zago misa sezmantageke erimago hu'za ha' huranteku neaze hu'naze.
